item.title: Pip Download and Install Pandas
item.description: Pip Download and Install 1 2 3 4 5 6 $ # Download $ pip download --platform win_amd64 --only-binary=:all: --python-version 37 --implementation cp --abi cp37m pandas $ # Install $ pip install --no-index --find-links=. pandas
